translations: adj.俏皮的；漂亮的（nifty 的变形）

sentences.sentence: Here are 10 of the niftiest fever-busting strategies for the workplace.
sentences.translation: 这里有10个极好的在工作场所击退发烧的策略。

sentences.sentence: All in all, this makes TMPFS the niftiest RAM-based filesystem I've had the opportunity to meet.
sentences.translation: 总而言之，这让tmpfs成为我有机会遇到的最好的基于RAM的文件系统。

sentences.sentence: It would, people widely believed, achieve the highest living standards and pioneer the niftiest technologies.
sentences.translation: 当时，人们普遍相信日本会成为最高生活水平的实现者，成为各种便利科技的开拓者。
